topic.title: PARENTS SEEN BY SENIOR STAFF MEMBER WITHIN 24 HOURS OF ADMISSION INDICATOR
topic.shortdesc: An indication of whether the parents of a baby admitted to a Neonatal Intensive Care Unit, were seen by a senior staff member within 24 hours of the CRITICAL CARE START DATE AND TIME.
